name: Bugs Out
description:
-*- About the game -*-

This is a clone of Bugs in the Kitchen board game by Ravensburger where 2 players try to guide a bug to capture enough resources to win the game. This is my first participation in a game jam (Game Off 2021) and I'm proud to have delivered something playable with bugs 🐛.

-*- How to Play -*-

The game is 2 players only for the moment. A random player is starting first. The game randomly assign a resource to collect by players.

A dice rolls to show which kind of obstacles you can rotate by clicking on it. Each time you click on an obstacle, a new turn begins and the other player does the same.

The first one who is reaching 5 coins win the game !
